title: Publication Metadata Schema
description: Schema for extracting publication bibliographic metadata

first_author_lastname.description: CRITICAL: Last name of first author only - essential for generating unique record identifiers (e.g., Smith2023-o1). Search thoroughly in title area, headers, footers, and citation blocks.

publication_year.description: CRITICAL: Year of publication - essential for generating unique record identifiers (e.g., Smith2023-o1). Search thoroughly near author names, copyright notices, and date stamps.

journal.description: Journal name if this is a journal article

publisher.description: Publisher name (e.g., 'Pergamon Press Ltd', 'Wildlife Disease Association')
